title: CCI nod for Religare stake buy deal without prejudice: Legal expert
description: On Tuesday, the Competition Commission of India (CCI) approved the acquisition of 31.27 per cent of additional stake in Religare Enterprises by four entities of Dabur India promoter Burman family.
